alert.note: Alert for Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 3:23PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Washburn and northwestern Sawyer Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 323 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Seeley, to near Round Lake, to near Hayward, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Hayward and Round Lake around 330 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Chippewa Flowage East and Little Round Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
